description:
Easily flip through local sale papers!

We are working together with America’s largest retailers to add more weekly ads and make sure you never miss a sale! 

Retale enhances your shopping experience by making it easier than ever to find great deals and in-store promotions at some of America’s largest retailers, such as Walmart, Target, CVS, Walgreens, Best Buy, Toys "R" Us, Macy's, Office Depot, Family Dollar or JCPenney and we are constantly adding new partners to our network. 

Not only are local sale papers delivered to your mobile device, you can create alerts so that you are notified when stores you like are having promotions. 
Beyond finding deals, Retale saves you time by allowing you to quickly clip coupons, create shopping lists, and find an open store near you – no paper, no pencil, no scissors required.

Retale delivers results for locations across America e.g. San Francisco, Chicago, New York, Seattle, Atlanta, Phoenix, Miami, Minneapolis, Boston, Denver, Nashville, San Diego, and more.

Save paper and help keep the environment clean by using Retale!
----------------------------
Features and Functionality:

- Scroll easily through brochures in your area
- Find addresses, opening hours and telephone numbers
- Search for individual products
- Get notified automatically of new offers 
- Save single pages 
- be alerted before the offer expires
- Create shopping lists

We are constantly working to improve our app and we appreciate your feedback: 
please contact us: app-feedback@retale.com

---------------------------
Important Information:

Privacy Policy: http://api.mobile.retale.com/iphone/api/v1/site/privacyInfo?device=iphone
Tracking: http://api.mobile.retale.com/iphone/api/v1/site/adsAndTracking?device=iphone
releaseNotes:
This version includes improvements and minor bug fixes.

Thank you for using Retale. We are continuously working to improve our app. For suggestions or in case of any problems please contact us: app-feedback@retale.com
